title: Pudolla Men’s 2 in 1 Running Shorts 5" Quick Dry Gym Athletic Workout Shorts for Men with Phone Pockets
description: HIGH PERFORMANCE: Upgraded fabric offer a lightweight, breathable and soft touch which more comfortable and move-freely.
FUNCTION POCKETS: Phone pocket design to prevent that out slipping, keep free movement. back zipper pocket securely stash cash, keys, cards, keep your hands free during activities.

CHAFE FREE PROTECTION: 2 in 1 designed with lightweight outer layer and breathable lining. Compression short support the private protection, reduce the risk of bruising and protect your legs during activities.
ELASTIC WAISTBAND: Gym shorts with elastic waistband constructed, internal draw cord for a personalized fit, easy to adjust and firm support.
VERSATILE SUITABLE FOR: Pudolla men's workout running shorts geared for indoor and outdoor wear, running, training, athletic, fitness, hiking and other training activities.
